ygData.subject: EQ On the Brain [OT]
ygData.msgSnippet: I guess this can be on the list of - you know you re playing too much Everquest when... Was playing in one of my bands last night - where they need to balance
ygData.messageBody:
I guess this can be on the list of - you know you're playing too much Everquest when...

Was playing in one of my bands last night - where they need to balance the solos between the three horns better - most of the solos go to the baritone sax (go figure)..

So anyway - we get a new version of a tune and instead of all three horns getting solos - there are only two (for me - trombone and the alto sax) and I think to myself "Wow, they nerfed the baritone part..."

Slyde


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
